db:article.db:para: Provides algorithms to help optimize meshes for GPU render stages, reduce the mesh complexity and storage overhead.
Used to generate Level of Detail meshes for Models in Qt Quick 3D
The sources can be found in qtquick3d/src/3rdparty/meshoptimizer.
